cooking_method: Mix semolina, flour, salt and baking powder. Add water to make a dough. Make small balls and flatten them. Fry in oil until crispy. Serve with tamarind water and chopped onions.
Fry bread slices in ghee until golden brown. Boil milk, condensed milk and sugar. Add fried bread slices to the milk mixture. Let it soak for 10 minutes. Serve cold.
Mix yogurt, condensed milk, sugar and cardamom powder. Pour the mixture into a greased bowl. Cover with foil. Steam for 30 minutes. Let it cool. Serve cold.
